Package minidraw.framework

This package contains the central interfaces and abstractions of MiniDraw.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Drawing The model component of the MVC pattern, a container of figures in MiniDraw.
DrawingChangeListener DrawingChangeListener defines the role of an object listening to events from a Drawing.
DrawingChangeListenerHandler The DrawingChangeListenerHandler defines a role for an object that maintains the set of DrawingChangeListener's used by a Drawing.
DrawingEditor The DrawingEditor is an Object Server pattern that allows the different implementation of MiniDraw roles to access each other.
DrawingView The graphical output medium of MiniDraw, representing the View element of the MVC pattern.
Factory Abstract factory for creating implementations of the central roles used in MiniDraw.
Figure This interface defines the role of a figure in a MiniDraw drawing.
FigureChangeListener Listener interested in Figure changes.
GfxReporter GfxReporter: A strategy to report graphics operations in a DrawingView Responsibilities: Report drawing events in the graphics pipeline.
RubberBandSelectionStrategy A strategy for selecting figures when using the SelectAreaTracker.
SelectionHandler The selection handler role defines the interface for the responsiblity of managing a drawing's multiple figure selection mechanism.
Tool A tool defines a mode of the drawing view.
 

Class Summary
DrawingChangeEvent The change event originating from a drawing.
FigureChangeEvent FigureChange event passed to FigureChangeListeners.
 

Package minidraw.framework Description

This package contains the central interfaces and abstractions of MiniDraw. Author: Henrik Bærbak Christensen 2006.
